name: Louis F. GILBERTI, Successor to Highlands and Gilberti, Architects, v. The CITY OF PITTSBURGH, a Municipal Corporation, Petitioner

parties: Louis F. GILBERTI, Successor to Highlands and Gilberti, Architects, v. The CITY OF PITTSBURGH, a Municipal Corporation, Petitioner.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 91 W.D. Appeal Docket 1985.

casebody.head_matter:
499 A.2d 579
Louis F. GILBERTI, Successor to Highlands and Gilberti, Architects, v. The CITY OF PITTSBURGH, a Municipal Corporation, Petitioner.
